About.Hours & facilities: Open daily 3pm-8pm. No reference service or copying services available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: Minimum age 16 years. One week's advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Events and photographs; annual reports and newsletters.

About.Major holdings: Box Hill Hospital: Annual Reports 1956- . Public Relations Department : Newsletters; photographs .
